description:
AJYV-10 EMBROIDERED CHIFFON 3 PCS

By Pcs: 3 Pcs Shirt: Chiffon Trouser: Twisted Silk Dupatta: Chiffon Color: Pink

Drape yourself in the whispers of the feminine essence with this powder-pink ensemble, a canvas of captivating allure. The embroidered Peshwas, a vision of pure elegance, is adorned with pink dori work intertwined with silver zari threads, shimmering like moonlight on a rose petal. Silver sequins dance in harmony with the pink hues, creating a radiant symphony. The exquisitely embroidered dupatta, serving as a drape of poise, completes the ensemble, embodying the delicate whisper of femininity, perfect for a look that is both glamorous and understated.
DESIGN DETAILS:

Embroidered front bodice on chiffon
Embroidered back bodice on chiffon
18 embroidered kalis for peshwas on chiffon
4 meter embroidered border for hemline on chiffon
Pair of embroidered sleeves with border on chiffon
2.5 meter embroidered dupatta on chiffon with 4 side borders
1.5 meter dyed wide with twisted silk for trouser
